alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 1:33PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches possible, with localized higher amounts between 8 and 12 inches at the crest of the Mogollon Rim along the northern Gila County border. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Payson, Pine, and Strawberry. * WHEN...From Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Sunday to 11 PM Monday: Forest Lakes 6 to 10 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches Payson 2 to 4 inches Pine-Strawberry 5 to 9 inches .
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
